Input:

คำแปล:
Pred: The group of students likes to go for a walk with the teacher in the evening because the weather is cool and comfortable, they can exercise, and the forest around the path makes the air very good as well.
Pred_Latin: The group of students likes to go for a walk with the teacher in the evening because the weather is cool and comfortable, they can exercise, and the forest around the path makes the air very good as well.
Gold: The group of students enjoys going for evening walks with their teacher because the weather is cool. They get some exercise, and the surrounding trees along the path make the air feel very refreshing.
